1.12.2.1.4-mc1.12.2: Survival update: Added crafting recipes, a sign printer and asphalt generation for a better survival experience. Also added some more stuff, you can find the complete changelog on planetminecraft or my website
1.12.2.1.5-mc1.12.2: Added yellow road line blocks and new signs and fixed most known issues
1.12.2.1.5.4-mc1.12.2: Signs now rotatable in 16 directions (instead of 4); 4 different heights for each road block; a few new signs
